candidates.title: Migrate to the `polkadot-sdk` umbrella crate
candidates.body: Some crates cannot be used from the umbrella crate, due to either their use of (proc) macros or features which aren't exposed from the umbrella crate.

candidates.title: Polkadot v1.15.0
candidates.body: Updates to the latest polkadot-sdk v1.15.0 stable LTS release. The next update will be in a year.

candidates.title: Fix ctrl-c bug
candidates.body: Fixes a bug that prevents the node from shutting down when it receives a ctrl-c signal. It was caused by blocking on the essential task, instead of spawning it with the task manager

candidates.title: Add crate metadata for crates.io publishing
candidates.body: Adds the relevant crate metadata to allow publishing sc-simnode

candidates.title: Upgrade to polkadot-sdk@v1.7.0
candidates.body:
Now that the polkadot-sdk is (somewhat) available on crates.io, simnode will now follow the polkadot-sdk version releases.
This is just an initial PR to bring it up to date.

candidates.title: subxt fix
candidates.body:
- Pointed to crates.io `subxt` version 0.31.0
- Regenerated and fixed codegen files

candidates.title: add standalone runtime
candidates.body: Standalone runtime and node for Babe and Grandpa

repo.name: sc-simnode
repo.description: Simulation testing environment for polkadot-sdk based blockchains
